channel.title: CVE Feed for fxbin -- bubble-fireworks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for fxbin -- bubble-fireworks

item.title: CVE-2021-29500|2024-08-03T22:11:05.453Z -- fxbin -- bubble-fireworks
item.description: bubble fireworks is an open source java package relating to Spring Framework. In bubble fireworks before version 2021.BUILD-SNAPSHOT there is a vulnerability in which the package did not properly verify the signature of JSON Web Tokens. This allows to forgery of valid JWTs.
